channel.title: Yazeed Alaudah
channel.description: I'm a PhD student at Georgia Tech

item.title: Research Internship at MERL
item.description: Iâ€™m very excited to join Mitsubishi Electric Research Labs (MERL) in Cambridge, Massachusetts, as a research intern this summer. MERL is a world-class research center that conducts basic and applied research in areas ranging from communications and electronics to signal processing and machine learning. I will be working on a project related to computer vision. Iâ€™m looking forward towards an exciting and productive summer.

item.title: Summer internship at Panasonic Automotive's Innovation Center
item.description: Iâ€™m glad to be joining Panasonic Automotiveâ€™s Innovation Center in Technology Square in Atlanta as an intern this summer. Iâ€™ll be mainly working on a project closely related to my research. Looking forward to an exciting few months!

item.title: Hello World!
item.description:
Hello world, I have a confession. Iâ€™ve been trying to start a blog for some time now. I started my first blog back in 2007 and after writing a few posts, my enthusiasm faded away quickly. I donâ€™t want that to happen again, so Iâ€™m mainly writing this post to shame my future self into keeping the habit, and writing more. ðŸ˜‰

Iâ€™ll be mainly writing about technical ideas that Iâ€™m interested in, conferences that I attend, and books that I read. Iâ€™ll admit I am mostly doing this for selfish reasons. In part to get into the habit of writing, and explaining technical ideas clearly, but also to give me an opportunity to rethink and understand different topics in a better way. I really believe that the best way to fully understand something is to attempt to teach it to someone else.

I hope in the coming days and weeks you would find something useful here. I learn a lot from your feedback so please feel free to comment down below.
